timeline.bodyText: Semicolons only come after L/reference types :)
timeline.author: Gegy
Gegy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,5 +1,7 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_1676 net/minecraft/entity/projectile/ProjectileEntity
 	FIELD field_22478 ownerUuid Ljava/util/UUID;
+	FIELD field_23739 ownerEntityId I
+	FIELD field_23740 leftOwner Z

replies.bodyText:
ownerEntityId is the entity ID of the owner, matching ownerUuid.
From looking at method_26961, it looks like leftOwner (name from its corresponding NBT tag) is whether or not the projectile is out of a range from its owner.
replies.author: wackbyte

replies.bodyText: Yeah otherwise mojang projectile have like hitting owner/blocking sight in rendering etc
replies.author: liach
